com.absio.file.mapper

Class KeyFileMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.file.mapper.AbstractFileMapper
      • com.absio.file.mapper.KeyFileMapper

  • public class KeyFileMapper
extends AbstractFileMapper
    This maps all KeyFile data to/from the OFS. All create, read, update and delete operations relating to raw KeyFile data (encrypted KeyRing) are handled by the mapper. No logic for encrypting or decrypting exists in the mapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyFileMapper(KeyRing keyRing, OFS ofs)
      Create a KeyFile mapper for the given KeyRing and OFS.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Creates or updates the user's KeyFile bytes in the OFS, possibly creating both directory and file.
      void delete(UUID userId)
      Delete the users KeyFile from the OFS.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeyFileMapper

        public KeyFileMapper(KeyRing keyRing,
                     OFS ofs)
        Create a KeyFile mapper for the given KeyRing and OFS.
        Parameters:
        keyRing - the key ring of the mapper
        ofs - the ofs of the mapper

    • Method Detail

      • createOrUpdate

        public boolean createOrUpdate(UUID userId,
                              byte[] encryptedKeyFileBlob,
                              boolean overwrite)
                       throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                              IOException
        Creates or updates the user's KeyFile bytes in the OFS, possibly creating both directory and file.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id that owns the key file
        encryptedKeyFileBlob - the KeyFile (encrypted KeyRing)
        overwrite - true if the KeyFile should overwrite an existing file
        Returns:
        true if the KeyFile was successfully written
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the hash algorithm used by the OFS is not supported
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues trying to write the KeyFile

      • delete

        public void delete(UUID userId)
            throws IOException,
                   NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Delete the users KeyFile from the OFS.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id that owns the key file
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues trying to delete the KeyFile
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the hash algorithm used by the OFS is not supported

      • get

        public byte[] get(UUID userId)
           throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                  IOException
        Get the encrypted KeyFile bytes from the OFS.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id that owns the key file
        Returns:
        the encrypted KeyFile bytes. Null if the KeyFile does not exist in the OFS.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - thrown if the hash algorithm used by the OFS is not supported
        IOException - thrown if there were any issues trying to get the KeyFile
